TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_mapulung, title = mapulung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/mapulung} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:一起；總共) u laluma'an kami a mapulung. 我們都是親戚.
(kamo no holam:一起；總共) o laloma'an kami a mapolong. 我們都是親戚.
